mapper.update: update b_instoreloss set billid=billid ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,instordate=#{instordate} ,btrimqty=#{btrimqty} ,btwaterrate=#{btwaterrate} ,atwaterrate=#{atwaterrate} ,waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} ,btimpurate=#{btimpurate} ,atimpurate=#{atimpurate} ,impulossqty=#{impulossqty} ,lossqty=#{lossqty} ,atrimqty=#{atrimqty} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,remark=#{remark} where billid=#{billid}

update b_instoreloss set billid=billid ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,instordate=#{instordate} ,btrimqty=#{btrimqty} ,btwaterrate=#{btwaterrate} ,atwaterrate=#{atwaterrate} ,waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} ,btimpurate=#{btimpurate} ,atimpurate=#{atimpurate} ,impulossqty=#{impulossqty} ,lossqty=#{lossqty} ,atrimqty=#{atrimqty} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,remark=#{remark} where 1=1 and billid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and billid =#{Where_Id} and billid=#{Where_billid} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and instordate=#{Where_instordate} and btrimqty=#{Where_btrimqty} and btwaterrate=#{Where_btwaterrate} and atwaterrate=#{Where_atwaterrate} and waterlossqty=#{Where_waterlossqty} and btimpurate=#{Where_btimpurate} and atimpurate=#{Where_atimpurate} and impulossqty=#{Where_impulossqty} and lossqty=#{Where_lossqty} and atrimqty=#{Where_atrimqty} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.billid "billid", t.billcode "billcode", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.instordate "instordate", t.btrimqty "btrimqty", t.btwaterrate "btwaterrate", t.atwaterrate "atwaterrate", t.waterlossqty "waterlossqty", t.btimpurate "btimpurate", t.atimpurate "atimpurate", t.impulossqty "impulossqty", t.lossqty "lossqty", t.atrimqty "atrimqty", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname", ls.storagename "storagename", lgr.grainattrname "grainattrname" from b_instoreloss t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lgr on lgr.grainattrid=t.grainattrid where billid=#{billid}

select t.billid "billid", t.billcode "billcode", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.instordate "instordate", t.btrimqty "btrimqty", t.btwaterrate "btwaterrate", t.atwaterrate "atwaterrate", t.waterlossqty "waterlossqty", t.btimpurate "btimpurate", t.atimpurate "atimpurate", t.impulossqty "impulossqty", t.lossqty "lossqty", t.atrimqty "atrimqty", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark" from b_instoreloss t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.instordate=#{instordate} and t.btrimqty=#{btrimqty} and t.btwaterrate=#{btwaterrate} and t.atwaterrate=#{atwaterrate} and t.waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} and t.btimpurate=#{btimpurate} and t.atimpurate=#{atimpurate} and t.impulossqty=#{impulossqty} and t.lossqty=#{lossqty} and t.atrimqty=#{atrimqty} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark}

select t.billid "billid", t.billcode "billcode", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.instordate "instordate", t.btrimqty "btrimqty", t.btwaterrate "btwaterrate", t.atwaterrate "atwaterrate", t.waterlossqty "waterlossqty", t.btimpurate "btimpurate", t.atimpurate "atimpurate", t.impulossqty "impulossqty", t.lossqty "lossqty", t.atrimqty "atrimqty", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark" from b_instoreloss t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.instordate=#{instordate} and t.btrimqty=#{btrimqty} and t.btwaterrate=#{btwaterrate} and t.atwaterrate=#{atwaterrate} and t.waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} and t.btimpurate=#{btimpurate} and t.atimpurate=#{atimpurate} and t.impulossqty=#{impulossqty} and t.lossqty=#{lossqty} and t.atrimqty=#{atrimqty} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark}
mapper.delete: delete from b_instoreloss where 1=1 and billid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and billid =#{Where_Id} and billid=#{Where_billid} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and instordate=#{Where_instordate} and btrimqty=#{Where_btrimqty} and btwaterrate=#{Where_btwaterrate} and atwaterrate=#{Where_atwaterrate} and waterlossqty=#{Where_waterlossqty} and btimpurate=#{Where_btimpurate} and atimpurate=#{Where_atimpurate} and impulossqty=#{Where_impulossqty} and lossqty=#{Where_lossqty} and atrimqty=#{Where_atrimqty} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and remark=#{Where_remark}

"storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.instordate "instordate", t.btrimqty "btrimqty", t.btwaterrate "btwaterrate", t.atwaterrate select count(*) from b_instoreloss t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billid!=#{NoId} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.instordate=#{instordate} and t.btrimqty=#{btrimqty} and t.btwaterrate=#{btwaterrate} and t.atwaterrate=#{atwaterrate} and t.waterlossqty=#{waterlossqty} and t.btimpurate=#{btimpurate} and t.atimpurate=#{atimpurate} and t.impulossqty=#{impulossqty} and t.lossqty=#{lossqty} and t.atrimqty=#{atrimqty} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark}
SELECT ifnull(max(billcode),CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d"),'-0001')) FROM b_instoreloss where billcode like CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d"),"%") and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
